import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import products from '../products' import { Row, Col, Image, Card, Button, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = () => { const {id:productId} = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === productId); console.log(product); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock "} ) } export default ProductScreen
